mapper.insert:
insert into cf_org_module (id, b0111, mu_id) values
(#{item.id},#{item.orgId},#{item.checkId})

insert into cf_org_system (id, b0111, system_id) values
(#{item.id},#{item.orgId},#{item.checkId})

insert into cf_org_leadertype (id, b0111, leadertype_id,info_id) values
(#{item.id},#{item.orgId},#{item.leaderTypeId},#{item.checkId})

insert into cf_org_sub (id, b0111, managed_org) values
(#{item.id},#{item.orgId},#{item.checkId})
insert into cf_org_module (id, b0111, mu_id) select uuid.Nextval,#{tarOrgId},rm.mu_id from cf_org_module rm where rm.b0111=#{srcOrgId}
insert into cf_org_sub (id, b0111, managed_org) select uuid.Nextval,#{tarOrgId},managed_org from cf_org_sub where b0111=#{srcOrgId}
insert into cf_org_leadertype (id, b0111, leadertype_id,info_id) select uuid.Nextval,#{tarOrgId},leadertype_id,info_id from cf_org_leadertype where b0111=#{srcOrgId}
insert into cf_org_system (id, b0111, system_id) select uuid.Nextval,#{tarOrgId},system_id from cf_org_system where b0111=#{srcOrgId}
mapper.select: select m.mu_id from cf_org_module rm inner join cf_module m on rm.mu_id=m.mu_id where m.mu_state='1' and rm.b0111=#{orgId} order by order_index
select s.id from cf_org_system rs inner join cf_system s on rs.system_id = s.id where rs.b0111=#{orgId} order by s.order_index
SELECT id as "id", item_name as "label",parent_item_code as "pId" FROM sys_dict_item where dict_code=#{dictCode} ORDER BY orderindex
select rb.managed_org from cf_org_sub rb inner join b01 b on rb.managed_org=b.b0111 where rb.b0111=#{orgId}

SELECT dt.tab_code as "id",dt.tab_name as "label" FROM cf_org_leadertype ol inner join data_table dt on ol.info_id=dt.tab_code where ol.b0111=#{orgId} and ol.leadertype_id=#{leaderTypeId} ORDER BY dt.order_index
